description: This is a Dart source file implementing the HomeScreen widget for a Flutter music streaming app, displaying playlists and recent songs.

classes.name: HomeScreen
classes.description: A StatelessWidget that displays featured playlists and recent songs in a scrollable view with app bar and song list.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the widget tree for the HomeScreen, including app bar, headers, and list of songs with interaction handlers.
